question: After intimacy made wadu & went back to bed. Morning when I woke up I found out that there was not enough water to take bath. In this state am I permissible to offer the regular 5 prayers
answer:
QUESTION
Salaam, pls. answer my following questions: 1)one night after having intercourse with my wife I washed my self & made wadu & went back to bed. Morning when I woke up I found out that there was not enough water to take bath. In this state am I permissible to offer the regular 5 prayers. 2)With reference to one of the question on this web site reference 11124: are there any medicines mentioned by Prophet (pbuh) or his companions or any of the noble men in past (who practiced medicine) so that one can increase the length of penis. 3)Is it permissible for husband & wife to help each other in removing hairs from each others private parts? 4)Is it permissible to stay in wife even after ejaculation & continue the intimacy further to satisfy wife?s desire?
ANSWER


Share:
1. If there was no water available in the radius of 1.8km, then you would have to make tayamum , with which salah would be saheeh. This tayamum would break as soon as you found water.

2. We are unaware of any medicine. You should consult a hakeem.

3. It is permissible, however gazing at the private parts of one another is not advised.

4. Not only is it permissible, but it would be preferred.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
